title: Belgium police break up fake festival started as April Fools' joke
content:
1. Belgium police break up fake festival started as April Fools' joke  BBC News
  2. April Fool: Belgians' hoax concert problem  Reuters
  3. Belgian police clash with partiers over Covid-19 restrictions  FRANCE 24 English
  4. Thousands party in Brussels Bois de la Cambre as April Fools' joke gets out of hand  The Brussels Times
  5. Riot police break up large crowds gathered in Brussels park for fake concert | AFP  AFP News Agency
